identity.name: Electric Candy
identity.description: A vibrant, character-driven experience that fuses gaming aesthetics with intimate social apps. Deep dark backgrounds make the neon accents and character portraits pop.

typography.rules: Headings must use 'Outfit' with tight tracking. Body text uses 'DM Sans' for high readability. varying weights to create hierarchy.

landing_page.hero: Full viewport height (min-h-screen). Immersive background image/video with heavy gradient overlay. Centered or split layout. 'Call to Action' must be prominent and glowing.
landing_page.grid: Use 'Bento Grid' for features. Uneven spans (col-span-2 vs col-span-1) to create visual interest.

character_selection.style: Tinder-like cards or Masonry Grid. Large imagery. Minimal text overlay. Focus on the 'Vibe' of the character.
character_selection.filters: Horizontal scrollable pill list for categories (e.g., 'Anime', 'Realistic', 'Funny').

chat_interface.container: Mobile-first width on desktop (max-w-md mx-auto) or split screen (List Left, Chat Right).
chat_interface.bubbles: AI messages: Glassmorphism or Dark Grey. User messages: Primary Gradient. Rounded corners (rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm for user, rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm for AI).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-primary/25 transition-all duration-300 rounded-full font-bold uppercase tracking-wide px-8 py-3
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary/10 text-secondary border border-secondary/20 hover:bg-secondary/20 rounded-full font-semibold

inputs.default: bg-white/5 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-xl p-4 text-white placeholder:text-white/30

cards.character: relative overflow-hidden group cursor-pointer transition-transform hover:scale-[1.02]. Image covers 100%. Gradient overlay at bottom for text.

realistic_females.alt: Casual friendly girl in striped shirt

anime_females.alt: Edgy anime style woman with makeup

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use simple linear gradients. Use radial or conic gradients for backgrounds to create depth.
Use `framer-motion` for micro-interactions (hover lift, tap scale).
Ensure 3:1 contrast ratio for large text and 4.5:1 for small text. Use APCA where possible.
For shadows, use colored shadows (e.g. shadow-primary/20) instead of black shadows on dark backgrounds.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'framer-motion' and 'lucide-react'. 2. Update tailwind.config.js with the colors provided. 3. Create a 'Layout' component that wraps the app with the dark theme and font classes. 4. Build the Character Card component first as it is the core visual element.
